ThingDef.label: mechcloud chemwalker shell
ThingDef.description: This pile of armor - unadorned and unassuming - has yet to be inscribed with the sigils and psychic catalysts necessary to be animated and yet to be given a chemfuel core to attract the swarm that will animate it. One day, though, this pile of steel and silver may yet serve a great cause - or perhaps it already has and patiently awaits the opportunity to do so again?

ThingDef.label: mechcloud chemwalker wreckage
ThingDef.description: This pile of battered and broken armor - little more than scrap - is all but devoid of the sigils and mechanites that once kept it animated. With repairs and sufficient time, though, this pile of steel and silver may yet once again serve its original cause - or perhaps the cause of a new master?

ThingDef.label: chemwalker infusion kit
ThingDef.description:
A one-use dose of mechanites within a delicate capsule designed to disintegrate on exposure with the chemfuel starter within a chemwalker's inscribed shell. The mechanites released upon the reaction will help jumpstart the initialization of the chemwalker - although a single dose may not be enough to fully bring a chemwalker into animation.

Infusion kits like these must be crafted at the drug lab by carefully disassembling mech serums or by processing and packaging luciferium. As the mechanites contained within pose no threat to the initialization process, the infusion of mechanites will greatly hasten the process of awakening the chemwalker.

Each dose is equivalent to half a quadrum's worth of accumulation, at average rate.
